articles.title: WHO gives Emergency Use Authorisation to Moderna's Covid jab - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: The shot from Moderna joins shots from Pfizer-BioNTech, AstraZeneca-SK Bio, Serum Institute of India and Janssen on WHO's list of emergency use vaccines.
